articles.author: Richard Bravo
articles.title: EU Set to Halt US Trade Deal Over Trump’s New Tariff Threat - Bloomberg
articles.description: European Union lawmakers are poised to halt approval of the EU’s trade deal with the US over President Donald Trump’s vow to impose tariffs on countries that supported Greenland in the face of American threats.
articles.content: European Union lawmakers are poised to halt approval of the EUs trade deal with the US over President Donald Trumps vow to impose tariffs on countries that supported Greenland in the face of American… [+189 chars]
